data-format.description: Defines the tree data source format.

max-level.description: Set max level for tree nodes.

multiple.description: Whether to support selected multiple tree nodes.

single-checked.description: Set single checked. Applicable only for the multiple tree.

auto-expand-parent.description: Whether to automatically expand root parent(s) treeNode.

default-expanded-keys.description: Specify the node keys of the default expanded treeNodes.
